Name: Lazerhawk
About the game: . Lazerhawk is a racing game inspired by the visuals, music, games and cars from the late 80s and early 90s. It's built on a custom game engine, with an authentic retro feel and unique graphics. you will first start with one car, then you will be able to upgrade it or buy other cars with the money earned at the end of each run. . Race your car through different unique level! Watch out for other vehicles on the road. playing this game it is a challenging and exciting experience. . Features: ■ No less than 8 cars . ■ More than 3 different level . ■ 4 different game modes . ■ Proper score system . ■ Purchase system of car performance upgrades . ■ Purchase system of new colors and wheels . ■ Endless Highway .
